tool_description: This api provides data for the tv show called New Girl. There is also data & details for each character.
name: New Girl
title: New Girl

api_list.name: Get specific number of characters
api_list.description: This route will provide you with a specific number of characters.

api_list.name: Get extra character details
api_list.description: Get extra details about a character. (Currently being updated with more data)

api_list.name: Get show facts & rotten tomato scores
api_list.description: You can find show data including season by season rotten tomato scores by hitting the home route.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://new-girl.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "new-girl.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get character by id
api_list.description: Providing the character id, you will get that specific character in the response. You can find a character id by hitting `/characters` and grabbing an id from there.

api_list.name: Get recurring characters
api_list.description: This endpoint gets the recurring characters within the show.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://new-girl.p.rapidapi.com/characters/recurring"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "new-girl.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get main characters
api_list.description: This route will provide you with the show's main characters

api_list.name: Get all characters
api_list.description: This will provide the show's characters with a tiny bit of data
api_list.code:
